website_summaries.verdict: Lenovo makes high-quality Windows laptops, and this IdeaPad does not disappoint.
pros: It’s got enough power to be a competent machine for work or school
Some of the best specs we’ve seen on a sub-$500 laptop, like 8GB of RAM, and a massive 256GB SSD
cons: The screen resolution is only 1366x768, which means there may not be enough screen real estate for many users

customer_reviews.title: Great for online school courses!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and light weight! I love this laptop. I am in nursing school and, with the covid -19 pandemic, have had to do all of my schooling online. This laptop has made live streaming meetings and lectures possible for me.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: MIsleading. The product description specifies Windows 10 Home 64-bit. It in fact comes with Windows in S mode.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Paul Anderson

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME LAPTOP IN THE PICTURES!
customer_reviews.text: Picture says it’s touchscreen but it’s not. Also, the laptop in the picture has a backlit keyboard but mine is also not backlit. Need to speak immediately to a representative. This is ridiculous. Completely false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Emir S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable laptop for everyday browsing & video streaming! Even some light gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna deep dive into the specs and everything but this laptop is well worth the price! I use it on the go a lot and it's perfect for streaming 1080p60 YouTube videos or watching streams with! I even tested some games like WoW Classic on it! Which runs at a solid 60 on low settings even with a 1080p rendering setting (I bought a monitor for that as this laptop is not 1080p) Super good laptop for the price!
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this computer for a few days and so far I have no complaints. My only concern is that it has Windows 10 S and not Windows 10 as given in its specifications on the site.
customer_reviews.author: Sue NJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 10 year old daughter because she had gone through several of anther brand and it was a great purchase. Occasionally it will freeze the screen, but I think that was the app she was using and all I did was reset it and it was just fine. The charging port is sometimes finicky, but will charge fast when you find one that will work. When her sisters kill the other brand tablets that they have I will definitely purchase another of these for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: a pretty good laptop
customer_reviews.text: thin and light weight but still feels solid, definitely a good laptop, however the seller said it has a back lit keyboard and it turns out it very much doesn't. It is a great laptop but I'm thinking of returning it. I really need that back lit keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's lightweight. Screen size is awesome. Keys are light touch so you don't have to press hard. Im able to do all my course studies with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: stacey trammell

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard not backlit.
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop. But the keyboard is not backlit. On a Lenovo keyboard there is a light icon on the spacebar. Unfortunately no light icon on the spacebar on the Lenovo IdeaPad S340. And no fn key turns it on either.
customer_reviews.author: Draxxer

customer_reviews.title: Daily struggle with the microphone wreck an otherwise great experience.
customer_reviews.text: Because we live on Zoom (now) having to deal with a microphone where no one can hear my son is becoming unbearable. Having him start every sentence with, “can you hear me” is driving me to replace laptop after 6-7 months. Definitely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Day

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop and Even Better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this laptop and so for its been exactly what we needed. Light weight, screen looks great, and just an overall good item. Had a slight hiccup with the order but the seller promptly responded to my message and took care of the situation with zero hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo idea pad 3
customer_reviews.text: Very light, screen amazing, quality Good, its not touch screen, touch pad very good. The only bad things is the says one spec and I receive other spec I mean about the retro iluminate keyboard
customer_reviews.author: ron 87 all

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for e- learning
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product. Not great video quality. But my kid likes it for school. It's got a ten-key pad and a wide screen for my ten-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Sade C.

customer_reviews.title: Fast SSD and Reliable. Big enough Screen
customer_reviews.text: Fast solid state drive. Very reliable with no issues. 15.6 inch screen is large enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The camera quit working within a day. It was poor quality which surprised me. Very pixelated when it did work first time I used laptop. Second time camera didn’t work and after several hours of troubleshooting I asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop less than a year and it has had three separate major problems, one involving it to be sent in for two weeks. Not worth the low pricetag. Lenovo support is laughably useless as well. They can't help on 3pm on a Monday because they don't have any technicians in... what??
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Not Linux friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Great General laptop if you're using Windows. Not Linux friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Skunkarific

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price. This is the 2nd time I have bought a Lenovo and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Keys
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with instructions and what the keys are used for. Example F1 - F12
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4/17/2020 and ony lasted unill 11/17/2020 Sound system began failing around 6/2020, afer the blue tooth streaming and Suddenly it stops working all together abd no longer boots. Avoid this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: MikeOM

customer_reviews.title: You can get a better machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 1 year. I am very unimpressed and will not be purchasing a Lenovo product again. Within 3 months the speakers went to crap. The spindle quality was ok to begin with but now I need to sync to my bluetooth speaker if I don't want to have crappy garbled sound. About every other time I put the laptop to sleep it will not wake up. I end up having to do a hard restart on the machine. Of course this causes me to lose what I am working in time and again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for wife school she seems to have no problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop if you like being plugged in all the time. The battery lasts 2 hours MAX. Will be my last Lenovo (my third purchase), 2 hours is far less than the 8.5 hours advertised. Be honest for crying out loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lenovo ideapad S340 15.6" HD LED Backlit Anti-Glare Display Laptop, Intel Core i3-8145U 2.1GHz up to 3.9GHz, 8GB DDR4, 128GB NVMe SSD, Bluetooth, USB 3.1, HDMI, Webcam, Windows 10 (Abyss Blue)
feature_bullets: Powerful and Smart - The IdeaPad S340 is powered by the 8th Gen Intel Core i3-8145U 2. 1GHz up to 3. 9GHz with 4MB SmartCache, so you’ll enjoy fast processing no matter what tasks you’re handling. It’s also included thoughtful design elements, such as the camera shutter that puts you in control of what your webcam sees. The 8GB DDR4 RAM and 128GB NVMe SSD provide plenty of storage either for work or gameplay.

Visual and Auditory Enjoyment - The IdeaPad S340 brings your audio experience alive with the theater-like sound of Dolby Audio. You'll also get the most of your display, thanks to its slim top and side bezels and Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 620.

Fit You the Most - If you're looking for powerful Intel processing in a 15" laptop, the IdeaPad S340 is the laptop for you. It's thin and light for easy portability. Narrow bezels let you get the most out of the display with optional touch. Thoughtful design details, like the webcam privacy and backlit keyboard completes your experience.

Complete Configuration - 2 x USB Type-A (USB 3. 1 Gen 1), 1 x USB 3. 1 Gen 1, 1 x HDMI 1. 4b, 1 x 1/8" / 3. 5 mm Headphone/Microphone Output and 1 x SDXC/MMCplus Hybrid satisfy your needs for work or gameplay.

Best System Yet - The Window 10 defends your desktops using built-in security tools that always stay current with the latest threats. Proactively safeguard your organization with enterprise-level security on all apps and devices. And give you the easy, collaborative experiences, with access to the latest intelligent technologies. Stay in control of your organization's devices while delivering rich capabilities across PC and mobile.
